entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 07 at 3:08PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...STORM FORCE LOWS FOR WEDNESDAY AND FRIDAY... A strong low over the Gulf of Alaska will bring a storm force front to the panhandle tomorrow. This system will bring increased winds along the outer coast. Wind gusts could range from 45 to 55 mph. Forecast guidance today continues to show a strong front impacting the area Wednesday morning to Thursday morning. As

entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued November 07 at 8:53AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...PM-10 HIGH POLLUTION ADVISORY FOR THE YUMA AREA WEDNESDAY... The Arizona Department of Environmental Quality (ADEQ) has issued a PM-10 High Pollution Advisory for the Yuma area on Wednesday. An episode of strong and gusty winds is forecast to generate widespread blowing dust that may result in local PM-10 concentrations that pose a health risk. Adverse health effects
